dict.acceptation: 阿姨；姨母，姑妈；舅妈；婶娘；

sent.orig: Mary kissed her aunt good-bye but her aunt didn't kiss her back. Why?
sent.trans: 玛莉吻了姑姑再见，可是姑姑却没有吻玛莉，为什么？

sent.orig: Aunt Edith's anteater ate Aunt Edith's ants.
sent.trans: 伊迪斯姑姑的食蚁兽吃了伊迪斯姑姑的蚂蚁。

sent.orig: They are Aunt Maggie and Aunt Lucy.
sent.trans: 他们是马吉阿姨和露西阿姨。

sent.orig: Cooper, who that same summer courted my aunt, grouped around a table in a sidewalk café.
sent.trans: 也是在那个夏天，他在一间路边咖啡厅里的圆桌前向我的姑姑求爱了。

sent.orig: Vernon mentions picking up Aunt Marge, whose train is due at 10 o'clock.
sent.trans: 弗农提起要去接玛姬，她的火车将在10点到达。
